languages.text: {n}Шпиль Опустошительной бури приветствует вас приглушенными звуками, сочащимися из-под темных сводов — отголосков голосов, шагов и криков боли.{/n}
{n}The Spire of the Reaving Tempest welcomes you with muffled noises seeping from its dark walls: distant voices, footsteps, and screams of pain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Шпиль Опустошительной бури приветствует вас приглушенными звуками, сочащимися из-под темных сводов — отголосков голосов, шагов и криков боли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Spire of the Reaving Tempest welcomes you with muffled noises seeping from its dark walls — distant voices, footsteps, and screams of pain.{/n}
{n}The Spire of the Reaving Tempest welcomes you with muffled noises seeping from its dark walls — distant voices, footsteps, and screams of pain.{/n}

{n}The Spire of the Reaving Tempest welcomes you with muffled noises seeping from its dark walls: distant voices, footsteps, and screams of pain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tour de la Tempête ravageuse vous accueille avec une cacophonie de bruits sourds, de voix étouffées, de bruits de pas et de hurlements d'agonie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Spire of the Reaving Tempest welcomes you with muffled noises seeping from its dark walls: distant voices, footsteps, and screams of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tour de la Tempête ravageuse vous accueille avec une cacophonie de bruits sourds, de voix étouffées, de bruits de pas et de hurlements d'agonie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}狂风阴谋团的尖塔迎接你的到来，阴沉沉的墙壁上传来了低沉的声音。你听到了遥远的呼喊声与脚步声，以及撕心裂肺的惨叫声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Spire of the Reaving Tempest welcomes you with muffled noises seeping from its dark walls: distant voices, footsteps, and screams of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}狂风阴谋团的尖塔迎接你的到来，阴沉沉的墙壁上传来了低沉的声音。你听到了遥远的呼喊声与脚步声，以及撕心裂肺的惨叫声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔の暗い壁からは、かすかな声や足音、苦悶の叫びなどのくぐもった音が染み出るように響いてあなたの耳に届いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Spire of the Reaving Tempest welcomes you with muffled noises seeping from its dark walls: distant voices, footsteps, and screams of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔の暗い壁からは、かすかな声や足音、苦悶の叫びなどのくぐもった音が染み出るように響いてあなたの耳に届いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Turm des plündernden Sturms begrüßt dich mit dumpfen Geräuschen aus dunklen Wänden – sie klingen nach fernen Stimmen, Schritten und Schmerzensschreien.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Spire of the Reaving Tempest welcomes you with muffled noises seeping from its dark walls: distant voices, footsteps, and screams of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Turm des plündernden Sturms begrüßt dich mit dumpfen Geräuschen aus dunklen Wänden – sie klingen nach fernen Stimmen, Schritten und Schmerzensschreien.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La torre de la Tempestad Asoladora te recibe con los ruidos apagados que emanan de sus oscuros muros: ecos lejanos de voces, pasos y gritos de dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Spire of the Reaving Tempest welcomes you with muffled noises seeping from its dark walls: distant voices, footsteps, and screams of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La torre de la Tempestad Asoladora te recibe con los ruidos apagados que emanan de sus oscuros muros: ecos lejanos de voces, pasos y gritos de dolor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi, seni karanlık duvarlardan sızan boğuk seslerle karşılıyor: Uzaktan gelen konuşmalar, ayak sesleri ve atılan acılı çığlıklar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Spire of the Reaving Tempest welcomes you with muffled noises seeping from its dark walls: distant voices, footsteps, and screams of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Müfteris Kasırga'nın Kulesi seni karanlık duvarlardan sızan boğuk seslerle karşılıyor: Uzaktan gelen konuşmalar, ayak sesleri ve atılan acılı çığlıklar.{/n}
